modShortDescription: Adjusts the TimeStayAfterDeath for entities (extending DroppedLoot container times, etc).
modDescription:
Adjusts the TimeStayAfterDeath for [entities](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/) (extending DroppedLoot container times, etc).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_EntityClasses_TimeStayAfterDeath)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
